pull.title: tests: Don't depend on value of DEFAULT_PERMIT_BAREMULTISIG
pull.body: Update unit and functional tests so that they continue to work if the default for `-permitbaremultisig` is changed.

events.message: tests: test both settings for permitbaremultisig in p2sh tests

tests: ensure functional tests set permitbaremultisig=1 when needed

The mempool_dust and mempool_sigoplimits functional tests both use bare
multisig txs, so ensure they're allowed by policy.
